Class Scene

Direct Known Subclasses:
CheckerboardScene, ChristmasScene, CornellBoxScene, MirrorBoxScene, StairwayScene, TestLightsScene, TetrisScene
public abstract class Scene
extends java.lang.Object

Scene that is represents by the scenery to be rendered and the camera to render it.
